archimate:Node.name: [L1 Base] LSSTCam Forwarders (Logical Node)
archimate:Node.documentation: Forwarder nodes acquire the pixel data. A Robust LSSTCam deployment will have extra forwarders to provide continuous service should a forwarder node fail. For LSSTCam, forwarding nodes perform both the Archiving function, and forwarding data over teh science data link to NCSA. Node provisioning must consider the Archiving, catchup archiving and prompt processing needs.
